mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.table_name as tableName, a.table_comment as tableComment, a.module_name as moduleName, a.entity_name as entityName, a.table_type as tableType, a.version_id as versionId, a.create_sql as createSql, a.origin_table_id as originTableId, a.remarks as remarks, a.create_date as createDate, a.create_by as createBy, a.update_date as updateDate, a.update_by as updateBy, a.del_flag as delFlag,
mapper.delete:
update _eppdev_table a
a.del_flag=1, a.update_date=#{updateDate}, a.update_by = #{updateBy},
and a.id=#{id} and a.del_flag = 0
